alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Clark; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 5:48PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clark, northeastern Pike and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 615 PM CST... At 548 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glenwood, or 16 miles north of Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glenwood... Amity... Salem in Pike County... Hopper... Kirby... Welsh... Rosboro... Caddo Gap... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Clark; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations
